Description_lang: Judgment grants you Virtuous Command for $339664d, which causes your Templar's Verdict, Crusader Strike, Blade of Justice, and auto attacks to deal |cFFFFFFFF${$s1}.1%|r additional Holy damage.

description_blz.en_US: Judgment grants you Virtuous Command for 5 sec, which causes your Templar's Verdict, Crusader Strike, Blade of Justice, and auto attacks to deal 10.0% additional Holy damage.
description_blz.es_MX: Sentencia te otorga Orden virtuosa durante 5 s, que causa que tu Veredicto del templario, Golpe de cruzado, Cuchilla de justicia y ataques automáticos inflijan un 10.0% más de daño sagrado.
description_blz.pt_BR: Ao usar Julgamento, você ganha Comando Virtuoso por 5 s, fazendo com que o Veredito do Templário, o Golpe do Cruzado, a Lâmina da Justiça e os ataques automáticos causem 10,0% de dano Sagrado adicional.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Richturteil' gewährt Euch für 5 Sek. 'Tugendhafter Befehl', wodurch Eure Fähigkeiten 'Urteil des Templers', 'Kreuzfahrerstoß' und 'Klinge der Gerechtigkeit' sowie Eure automatischen Angriffe zusätzlich 10,0% Heiligschaden verursachen.
description_blz.en_GB: Judgment grants you Virtuous Command for 5 sec, which causes your Templar's Verdict, Crusader Strike, Blade of Justice, and auto attacks to deal 10.0% additional Holy damage.
description_blz.es_ES: Sentencia te otorga Orden virtuosa durante 5 s, lo que provoca que tu Veredicto del templario, Golpe de cruzado, Hoja de justicia y tus ataques automáticos inflijan 10,0% p. de daño Sagrado extra.
description_blz.fr_FR: Jugement vous confère Commandement vertueux pendant 5 s, ce qui permet à Verdict du templier, Frappe du croisé, Lame de justice et aux attaques automatiques d’infliger 10,0% de dégâts du Sacré supplémentaires.
description_blz.it_IT: Giudizio fornisce Comando Virtuoso per 5 s, così che Verdetto dei Templari, Assalto del Crociato, Lama della Giustizia e gli attacchi automatici infliggano il 10,0% di danni da sacro aggiuntivi.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Правосудие" на 5 сек. дает "Благочестивый приказ", позволяя "Вердикту храмовника", "Удару воина Света", "Клинку справедливости" и автоатакам наносить 10,0% дополнительного урона от светлой магии.
description_blz.ko_KR: 심판 사용 시 5초 동안 고결한 명령이 부여되어 기사단의 선고, 성전사의 일격, 심판의 칼날, 자동 공격 시 10.0%의 추가 신성 피해를 입힙니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 審判會賦予你善潔命令，持續5秒，使你的聖殿騎士之裁決、十字軍聖擊、正義之刃和自動攻擊額外造成10.0%神聖傷害。
description_blz.zh_CN: 审判使你获得善德命令效果，持续5秒，使你的圣殿骑士的裁决、十字军打击、公正之剑和自动攻击额外造成10.0%的神圣伤害。
